post.body: say hi that is.
thanks :) I totally agree!
yeah. My kitchen's technology is so high end I made myself sign an NDA.
yeah they nuked the front porch to get everything inside ;)
it's in good hands.
give her a kiss for me.
had a great time with @bryanthatcher in SFO and I can't wait to visit you guys in NYC sometime soon.
congrats carnal! Guess what; big apt. waiting for you if you're still coming over!
since forever, bro ;)
hello! You should have ages ago ;)
soon enough, and not something I'd just reply on Twitter ;) keep an eye on hellomynameise.com for announcements.
welcome back!
yup. Paint bucket, eraser, select all and clear... Renovating your apartment with Photoshop would make it a lot more bearable.
I started construction as well, muhahaha!
you are such a geek ;)
the beers you put in my freezer exploded.
check out http://www.mynameise.com

yes, we've known about them for quite some time.
rofl idd!!
is torturing us with Christmas songs. Possibly sung by him.
you go to sleep! ;) One more production run and then I'm off ;)
next release :)

in my case it's not lack of method or planning. It really is about a grandieux lot of work.
>_< I feel for you.
I'm am definitely not saying I'd want to do this forever ;)
wouldn't even want that ;) but thanks. Peppernuts will do fine ;)
I don't know how you plan over there, but these hours are filled deliver awesome work if I say so myself. Every single one of them.
not saying I do te full 20 every day ;)
lol. Their words. I won't take it as an insult ;)
taking advantage of Basecamp downtime and spamming a little there, are we?
have fun in Kiwiland!
babe you just made me very hungry.
meer bezig met the valley en echt werk ;)

WTF! too lame.

effin' awesome :D thnx
not over here... strange.
thnx :) I like spicy.

in the house
where should we eat in Helsinki?
that's why I skipped breakfast. And dont get me wrong: I don't visit starbucks because of their coffee. Sugar is the key here.

ossom bring it over!

just received a fat NDA. Always fun >_<
yay @imogenheap is following me back. If you haven't heard of her... Google. She's fantastic!
working from home. Designing with people drilling is not really comfortable, but they've made great progress on the kitchen.

taking out concrete sucks major balls.

putting on some manly dirty clothes and picking up the drill. I'm going to pwn this kitchen floor.
realizing that I've experienced "Sinterklaas" only through Twitter this year. Haven't even had some proper peppernuts.

moving to Amsterdam has given me 3-4 additional hours of productivity everyday. I can now work 19-20 hours (with food breaks) per day.

back in the hotel room, catching some sleep before session tomorrow. Company is good and fun, tomorrow will be interesting!
